definitions.title: n. m. pl.
definitions.body: giants, acc. to LXX gi/gantev so SyrVer Vulgate; [[הַנְּפִלִים]] Ge 6:4 (J), [[הַנְּפִילִים בְּנֵי עֲנׇק]] [[מִן־הַנְּפִלִים]] Nu 13:33 (JE); LXX om. ´[[בְּנֵי וגו]], and so Di; these words perhaps doublet, but already in Sam., also Vulgate (etym. dub.; cf. Aram. [[נִיפְלָא]], [[נְפִילָא]] Orion; conject. v. in Thes Di:ad loc.; Tuch Kn Len:Or. i. 344, Eng. Tr. 345 f.; Che:Hbr. iii (1887), 175, 176; all very precarious).
